body:
Hi Olga,


You may need to include the -d option to rhcopy if you have 
set the OBSTRUCTIONS variable in bar.hif. This is mentioned
in the rhcopy man page.


-Greg


Quoting O Graf <s0343631 at sms.ed.ac.uk>:
